data.title: Royal Academy of Arts
data.meta_description: The Royal Academy of Arts, located in the heart of London, is a place where art is made, exhibited and debated.
data.text:
Mary Margaret Stanley Egerton, Countess of Wilton

The Art Of Needle-Work, From The Earliest Ages; Including Some Notice Of The Ancient Historical Tapestries. - Edited By The Right Honourable The Countess Of Wilton. - [Epigraph] - London:: 1840.
